Ice::

She sneered at MegaTon. "Veratis nothing.  This wasn't a gift or 
talent. Mine was unplanned." she said breathing heavy. "And I'll get 
you yet you walking pile of scrap metal. Mutants are not average 
bots. And it takes a lot more to keep us down." She spit at MegaTon. 
She looked at her shoulder and saw her white fur all stained red.  
She groaned and stood up on all four paws. "Now, you want to finish 
this? Or leave peacefully?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megatons negotiations seemed to be going well when suddenly energy 
bars
> appeared. "What is this some Maximal trick?" he looked around, the 
Maximals
> were still at alert status and didn't react when the cage appeared.
> 
> Lunarpine was trying to console Ice but when he tried to put his 
arms around
> her the cage appeared and a sudden shock was sent through him when 
he
> thought he made contact with the bars. "Ahhhh." he yelped, startled 
at the
> pain.
> 
> The yelp caught Megatons attention. "I stand corrected, this is not 
a
> Maximal trick, this is a Mutant trick." He watched as Ice collapsed 
to the
> ground. "And it would appear that Veratis gave us all some unique 
skills."
> The large bot smiled toward Ice sensing her dissapointment. .
